thread.section_title: World Nomads Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of World Nomads | worldnomads.com
thread.title: John Perry
thread.title_full: World Nomads reviewed by John Perry

author: John Perry
title: John Perry
text: Be sure to read what travel insurance covers. I thought it would cover me in case of my flight was cancelled or delayed due to airline incompetence. It does not! Royal Air Maroc cancelled our flight and did not notify us. It cost me an additional $1800 and is not covered by Workd Nomads. Read your policy!
